companies.title: Judging System
tasks: JudgingSystem is a Java project designed to streamline the process of scoring contestants in a competition. The system allows judges to input scores for each contestant across various criteria, automatically calculates the total score for each contestant, and provides a final ranking at the end of the competition. This project ensures accuracy and efficiency, making it easier to manage and evaluate multiple contestants fairly.

companies.title: Rental Car
tasks: RentalCar is a simple Laravel-based project developed to manage and streamline the process of renting vehicles. The system allows users to browse available cars, make reservations, and manage their bookings through a user-friendly interface.
